awd_titl_txt: The Molecular Control of Nitrate Reductase Synthesis in     Squash and Soybeans
awd_abstract_narration: The Molecular Control of Nitrate Reductase Synthesis in                    Squash and Soybeans:  The study of the regulation of nitrate                    reductase, the first enzyme in the nitrate assimilatory pathway                 will be studied using molecular biologic techniques C-DNA                       clones for soybean nitrate reductase isoforms will be isolated                  and characterized.                                                                                                                                                   Understanding control of this rate limiting enzyme for the                 use of nitrate by higher plants may make it possible to                         increase the efficiency of this energy costly process.
org_div_long_name: Division of Molecular and Cellular Biosciences
